query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS escalation_templates (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  level1_timeout_minutes INT DEFAULT 15 NOT NULL,
  level1_emails TEXT,
  level1_webhooks TEXT,
  level1_sms_enabled BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE NOT NULL,
  level1_sms_phones TEXT,
  level2_timeout_minutes INT DEFAULT 30 NOT NULL,
  level2_emails TEXT,
  level2_webhooks TEXT,
  level2_sms_enabled BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE NOT NULL,
  level2_sms_phones TEXT,
  level3_timeout_minutes INT DEFAULT 60 NOT NULL,
  level3_emails TEXT,
  level3_webhooks TEXT,
  level3_sms_enabled BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE NOT NULL,
  level3_sms_phones TEXT,
  alert_types TEXT,
  production_line_ids TEXT,
  machine_ids TEXT,
  is_default BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE NOT NULL,
  is_active BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE NOT NULL,
  created_by INT,
  created_at BIGINT NOT NULL,
  updated_at BIGINT NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_template_active (is_active),
  INDEX idx_template_default (is_default)
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2bBfAdpTc8yvngq.root --database RpnsLdN3u3f6PBDr9mn7Zq --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS escalation_templates (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  level1_timeout_minutes INT DEFAULT 15 NOT NULL,
  level1_emails TEXT,
  level1_webhooks TEXT,
  level1_sms_enabled BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE NOT NULL,
  level1_sms_phones TEXT,
  level2_timeout_minutes INT DEFAULT 30 NOT NULL,
  level2_emails TEXT,
  level2_webhooks TEXT,
  level2_sms_enabled BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE NOT NULL,
  level2_sms_phones TEXT,
  level3_timeout_minutes INT DEFAULT 60 NOT NULL,
  level3_emails TEXT,
  level3_webhooks TEXT,
  level3_sms_enabled BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE NOT NULL,
  level3_sms_phones TEXT,
  alert_types TEXT,
  production_line_ids TEXT,
  machine_ids TEXT,
  is_default BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE NOT NULL,
  is_active BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE NOT NULL,
  created_by INT,
  created_at BIGINT NOT NULL,
  updated_at BIGINT NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_template_active (is_active),
  INDEX idx_template_default (is_default)
);
